name: Dethrone (CasePortman)
description:
Dethrone is a short, tight platformer in which the stage evolves as you reach each goal, presenting a new challenge each time. Each death passes the current king's crown onto the next. Who will you have become king? 

-One stage/room 
-One colour (other than the plain white Background) 
-There can only be one king!

Music by Joel C (@lenkalamari)

For GMTKJam 2019 (Theme - Only One)
